mapper.select: SELECT used_count FROM ai_usage WHERE user_sid = #{userId} AND year = #{year} AND month = #{month}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_usage (user_sid, year, month, used_count, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{year}, #{month}, 1, now()) ON CONFLICT (user_sid, year, month) DO UPDATE SET used_count = ai_usage.used_count + 1, updated_at = now()
